excerpt: Easy and flavorful vegan lentil soup recipe.

instructions: In a large pot or Dutch oven, heat some olive oil over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, until they start to soften â€“ about 5 minutes.
Add carrot and celery. Cook for another 5 minutes, or until the vegetables become tender.
Add cumin, salt, and black pepper. Stir well.
Add lentils, vegetable broth, and tomato paste. Stir well.
Bring the soup to a boil, then reduce the heat to low. Simmer for 30 minutes or until the lentils are tender and fully cooked.
If the soup is too thick, add more water or vegetable broth.
Serve hot and garnish with fresh parsley.
